user_instruction: 'Send an update to Mr. Griffin (charles.griffin@griffinandmurdock.com) about how things are going with my projects. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Update

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me a brief update on each of your current projects? It would be helpful if you could outline:

• Key milestones reached so far  
• Any blockers or resources you might need  
• Expected next steps and timelines

Feel free to pull the most recent information from your Notion pages. If possible, I’d appreciate having the update by end of day Wednesday so I can review it ahead of next week’s meetings.

Thanks very much, and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,  
Charles Griffin  
Head, Griffin & Murdock Publishing

final_output:
